column1: Little Goat Diner////Both times when I have gone there has been a wait
column2: but their system is wonderful. You give your name
column5: and you can actually check how much longer you have to wait from your phone. You can also see how many parties are ahead of you. Also
column6: while waiting you are more than welcome to go wait in the Little Goat Bread section for a drink
column7: or a browsing of all of the little goat items.
